markdown:
| icon           = poe2 speckleback_jerky_icon.png
| description    = Bloatbelly eel, widely considered little more than a bait fish due to its unpalatable taste and chewy texture, can make for a meal, provided it is heavily salted and deep fried. One can never be sure if the cook has completely removed the bloatbelly's deadly venom sacks, however, so care must be taken when enjoying this Delver's Row "delicacy."
